info.title: Merchandise Category Hierarchy Node (A2X)
info.description: This service enables you to create, read, update, and delete merchandise category hierarchy node data. It includes merchandise category hierarchy node description, assignment of characteristic to merchandise category hierarchy node, assignment of merchandise category hierarchy node to parent merchandise category hierarchy node, and characteristic value restriction.

x-sap-shortText: Create and maintain merchandise category hierarchy node data using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: RFM - Merchandise Category and Merchandise Category Hierarchy Node Integration(SAP_COM_0799)
